update-account.p1: If you'd like to change your details, such as your username, your bio or your link, this is the place to do it !

username.label: Username
username.error: The username must be: min 3 characters, max 20 characters and no special characters.

bio.label: Bio
bio.error: The bio must be: max 150 characters.

link.label: Link
link.error: The link must be: an url
